## fetchUsersList

## fetchRastertilesets

## fetchAuthUser

This is action FETCH AUTH USER

## updateWorldState

This will fill store.world with current map location.<br>
It is called each time map is moved by user

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** current map params, as provided by mapbox
    -   `params.lng` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** longitude
    -   `params.lat` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** latitude
    -   `params.zoom` **[number](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)** zoom
    -   `params.bounds` **[Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array)** bounds

## clickPointCloud

**Parameters**

-   `$0` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `$0.features`  
    -   `$0.ctrlKey`  
    -   `$0.isAdmin`  

## resetCreateState

## resetLoginState

This is action RESET LOGIN STATE

## clickMedias

This will toggle media selection/deselection.<br>
It is called each time a user clicks on the map
and each time they click on a media in the Carousel component.

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `params.features` **[Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array)** array of media features that were clicked (can be empty)
    -   `params.ctrlKey` **[boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** whether user was pressing ctrl key when they clicked
    -   `params.isAdmin` **[boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** whether user has admin rights

**Parameters**

-   `userId`

## togglePointCloud

This is action TOGGLE POINT CLOUD

**Parameters**

-   `$0` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `$0.pointCloudId`  

## selectMediaById

This will toggle media selection/deselection.<br>
Used instead of clickMedias when only the media id is known.

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `params.mediaId` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** the id of the media to select
    -   `params.ctrlKey` **[boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** whether user was pressing ctrl key when they clicked
    -   `params.isAdmin` **[boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** whether user has admin rights

## switchPreviewMode

This will toggle store.previewMode (when previewMode=true, map fills the small part of the screen).<br>
It is called each time user clicks on PreviewSwitch component.

## resetDeleteState

**Parameters**

-   `form`  
-   `token`  

## toggleLayer

This will toggle a layer's visibility.<br>

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `params.layerId` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** id of the layer to toggle

## resetResetPasswordState

## startDragMapMedias

This will toggle media selection/deselection.<br>
Used instead of clickMedias when only the media id is known.

**Parameters**

-   `params` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `params.isAdmin` **[boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** whether user has admin rights
    -   `params.mediaId` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** the id of the media to select
    -   `params.ctrlKey` **[boolean](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean)** whether user was pressing ctrl key when they clicked
    -   `params.features`  

## dragMapMedias

**Parameters**

-   `$0` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `$0.lat`  
    -   `$0.lng`  
    -   `$0.isAdmin`  

## endDragMapMedias

**Parameters**

-   `$0` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** 
    -   `$0.lat`  
    -   `$0.lng`  
    -   `$0.feature`  
    -   `$0.isAdmin`
